page.title: 17Recreation,Scremerston.
page.content: Most of the recreation in Scremerston is created by the people themselves. For the younger ones there is a{Youth Club}which meets twice a week in the school.For the older ones there is an{Indoor Bowling Club}which meets twice a week during the winter-time and they hold regular whist drives, bingo sessions and domino evenings. Some of the ladies belong to the{Women's Institute}where they can learn handicrafts, listen to different speakers,hold there own social evenings or visit other Institutes in the vicinity. Hobbies mainly consist of gardening for there are many keen gardeners in the village.Indoors at the local pub people are able to play darts or dominoes or just even spend an evening talking to their friends.
